description:
My place is good for couples, business travelers, and furry friends (pets). It is steps from the best museums on the Upper East Side and across from Central Park. Its is also 3 blocks from the 4, 5, and 6 train. We have lived here over most of our lives and provide a detailed restaurant guide for the immediate neighborhood. It is quiet and full of culture. Please don't hesitate to ask us any questions.

There is a dishwasher, oven, heating and air conditioning. There is a Brita in the refrigerator and tap water is good to drink. There is a Shower/Bath in the bathroom. There is a desk in the bedroom, full closet with hangers and 3 drawers for storage. The TV has a surround sound and there a plenty of books and magazines, you can feel free to peruse.

You have access to the entire apartment and the laundry room downstairs.

We will be availble to answer questions throughout your stay.

The neighborhood is Carnegie Hill on the Upper East Side of Manhattan. You are in walking distance of terrific museums and great night life. It is quiet and family friendly. These include, The Met, The Guggenheim, The Met Breur, The Neue Gallery, The NY Historical Society, The Jewish Museum. There are cafés, restaurants and several supermarkets with walking distance. You can get delivery 24 hours a day. You are two blocks from a 24 pharmacy...

You are steps away from 5th avenue, the 4, 5, and 6 , the crosstown bus, and there are alway taxis or ubers available.
name: pristine, quiet UES apt next to Central Park #cozy
review: Great apartment accessible to the park and pure yoga, which is why we were staying. Everything was as described.
